document.full_text: ge  said it will buy about 90 percent of electrification and automation equipment maker converteam for $3.2 billion from a group of shareholders including barclays private equity and lbo france.
document.title: ge to acquire converteam for $3.2 billion
lines_and_colors: ge  said it will buy about 90 percent of electrification and automation equipment maker converteam for $3.2 billion from a group of shareholders including barclays private equity and lbo france.
